title: Did Lack of Social Distancing in 1918 Pandemic Cause More Deaths Than WWI?
subtitle: A viral meme about the "Spanish flu" pandemic gets some general points right, but the presented timeline is inaccurate.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: People started to ignore social distancing rules during the 1918 pandemic, leading to a second wave of infections that killed more people than all of World War I.
